title: Fire Maidens: Scotland (Billionaires & Bodyguards)
features: Holly Jennings wasn't planning on another trip to Scotland. And she certainly wasn't planning on a trip down memory lane with the hot Highlander who broke her heart. But she's never been much of a planner - more like a roll-with-the punches country gal. A good thing too, because "one last request" may not be the only thing a beloved mentor left her in his will. Before Holly knows it, she's heading on a mysterious mission to a remote island - and straight into danger.

Dragon shifter Lachlan McKenney likes his life logical and organized - not turned upside down by the impulsive beauty he's been trying to forget for years. Especially now that he's busy guarding a ruthless archenemy who's plotting to escape an island prison.

But Holly awakens every emotion Lachlan has been trained to resist: passion, hope, and forbidden desire. It seems there's no outrunning fate, just as there's no shirking duty. Against the odds, Lachlan must keep Holly safe on her mission to carry out a venerable old dragon's last wishes. At the same time, he must resist temptation, because letting his focus slip could cost Holly her life - and unleash a deadly foe.
Anna Lowe's FIRE MAIDENS: Billionaires & Bodyguards series

Danger lurks over Europe, where a ruthless dragon clan plots to seize power in the grandest, most glamorous cities. The guardians of old have summoned a new generation of shifter heroes to protect the castles, cathedrals, and cobblestoned streets of their ancestral homes - and to seek out the last of the Fire Maidens, women coveted by the dark lords for their royal blood. Those women are absolutely off-limits to the young warriors tasked with protecting them. But destiny, of course, has other ideas...

A series of sizzling paranormal romances with adult content. Each story is a page-turner packed with action, emotion, and romance! No cliff hangers. If you like smoldering hot shapeshifters, military heroes, and royal intrigue, you'll love these books. Join these strong heroines and their alpha heroes in atmospheric locales filled with danger & suspense!
description: Another country, another fire maiden and another story filled with shifters, amazing characters and romance. A must read series! Mystery, shifters, romance, sex, betrayal, suspense and everything I could ever want from a paranormal romance.
Available in ebook, paperback, and audio!
Fire Maidens: ParisFire Maidens: LondonFire Maidens: RomeFire Maidens: PortugalFire Maidens: IrelandFire Maidens: ScotlandFire Maidens: VeniceFire Maidens: GreeceFire Maidens: Switzerland

USA Today and Amazon best selling author Anna Lowe loves putting the hero back into heroine and letting location ignite a passionate romance. She loves dogs, sports, and travel - and letting those inspire her fiction. If she's not hunched over her laptop, working on her latest story, you'll find her hiking in the mountains or biking country roads. Either way, the day will end with a chunk of dark chocolate and a good read.
